ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song Selection Advice for a Level 35 Singer
ygData.msgSnippet: It depends on the puller.  If the puller was fetching from nearby rooms and bringing in wizzie frogs then having ER and using ER and Pixie (to interrupt) on
ygData.messageBody:
It depends on the puller. If the puller was fetching from nearby rooms and
bringing in wizzie frogs then having ER and using ER and Pixie (to
interrupt) on the wizzies in any cycles where you didn't need the pulse to
do CC was well recieved by ass/sup groups. Of course, you'd only want that
on the pulls with wizzie frogs. If not with everyone else having mana to
slow/haste etc .. yes .. you're mix would have been close to what I would
have picked. Unless the puller was always bringing singles, then I dropped
one of the CC songs for a chant.

One time in ass/sup I ended up with all tanks & rogues .. yep was only CC
and only healer for a time. And they pulled multiples including wizzie
frogs. Oooo my fingers got tired! Tho the core of the group was very
comfortable with me doing the CC, and I begged healers in tells until I got
one to come before my fingers just fell off. ;)

Menuette
also known as "Ribbit?" to a few ...

----- Original Message -----
From: <chris.holden@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2001 9:42 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Song Selection Advice for a Level 35 Singer


>
>
> Hello all,
>
> Last night I was in the Assassin/Supplier in Lower Guk for the first time.
Had
> myself (35 Bard), 44 Paladin, 46 Shaman, 44 Rouge, and 51 Warrior. I was
having
> trouble selecting which songs to use.
>
> The Shaman was speeding and Primary healer. I was there for Crowd Control
(I had
> an easy time with and blues and Zols which are low Red but hard time with
Wan's
> that were Yellow), Manasong, Snaring and ?.
>
> My 3 Song weave was Cantana (34), Snare (23) and Chant of Battle or Damage
> Shield. After a while the Shaman got enough mana back after buffing to
> slow/speed etc. So I switched to Chant of Battle primarily. During
downtime I
> did straight mana and depending on our condition would weave Cantana in as
well.
>
> What other suggestions for Song Selection do you guys/gals have? I also
had
> Pixie, Charm, Heal song, Manasong, and Area Fear mem'ed. At level 35 what
else
> could I have done? I know I could have used Elemental Rhythms (MR/FR/CR)
or even
> Gaurdian Rhythms (MR). Any other suggestions?
>
> Thanks for any suggestions and help.
>
> -Ranian
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
